(Simplified: 骁)
Chinese Definition:
①好馬。
②勇健：驍勇。驍將(jiàng)。驍悍。驍健。
驍將 [ xiāo jiàng ]: valiant general
驍勇善戰 [ xiāo yǒng shàn zhàn ]: to be brave and good at fighting (idiom)

驍字的基本解释

驍
xiāo
见“骁”。

驍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《廣韻》古堯切，平蕭，見。］
“骁1”的繁体字。
(1)良马。参见“驍騰”。
(2)勇猛。
(3)古代投壶游戏，箭从壶中跳出，用手接住再投，屡投屡跃，箭不坠地，称之“驍”。

驍字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驍； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1445第04
【唐韻】古堯切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】堅堯切，?音澆。【說文】良馬也。　又【玉篇】勇捷也。【廣韻】驍武，漢書，梟騎。借用梟，與驍通。　又【西京雜記】古之投壷取中而不求還，郭舍人則激矢令還，一矢百餘反，謂之爲驍。又《颜氏家訓》汝南周璝、會?徽，?能一箭四十餘驍。

考證：〔【禮·投壷】投壷妙者，有連花驍。驍者，矢躍出也。箭自壷躍出，復以手接之，屢投屢躍不墜地，曰驍。【西京雜記】郭舍人能投壷，一箭七十餘驍。〕　謹按投壷妙者云云壷篇無此語，所引西京雜記亦與原文不合，謹改爲：西京雜記古之投壷取中而不求還，郭舍人則激矢令還，一矢百餘反，謂之爲驍。又颜氏家訓汝南周璝會?徽?能一箭四十餘驍。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xiāo]
["Guangyun" Gu Yaoqi, Pingxiao, see. ]
Traditional characters for "Snap1".
(1) Good horse. See "Xiaoteng".
(2) Bravery.
(3) In the ancient pot-throwing game, the arrow jumps out of the pot, catches it with the hand, and throws it again, and the arrow does not fall to the ground.

[Tang Yun] Ancient Yao cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Strong Yao cut, sound poured. [Said the text] Good horse.　[Jade articles] Yongjie also. [Guangyun] Xiaowu, Hanshu, Xiaoqi. Borrow Xiao, and communicate with Xiao.　[Xijing Miscellaneous Notes] The ancient succumbed to the bogey without asking for repayment, Guo Sheren rushed to order the repayment. And "The Family Instructions of the Yan Family" Runan Zhou Jing, the emblem, can kill more than forty with one stone. Textual research: [[Ritual·Courtesy] There are even flowers for those who vote for the clever. The valiant, the arrow jumped out. The arrow leaped out of the mountain, and then picked it up with his hand, repeatedly jumping and not falling to the ground, saying Xiao. 【Xijing Miscellaneous】Guo Sheren can cast an arrow with more than seventy shots. 〔〕 　 I would like to say that there is no such thing in the Yunyunbo chapter of the wonderful man. The quoted Xijing Miscellaneous is also inconsistent with the original text. I would like to change it to: Xijing Miscellaneous Ancient Mistakes are taken without asking for return, Guo Sheren is eager to order and return. Hundreds of counters are called Xiaoxiao. Also, the family motto of the Yan family, Runan Zhou Huihui? Emblem? Can kill more than forty with one arrow.
